CustomField.formula:
IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d",
HYPERLINK("#/sObject/00O3A000009Lpqu/view?fv0=" & Id , "My Tour Plan Report" , "_self"),
HYPERLINK("/00O3A000009Lpqu?pv0=" & Id, "My Tour Plan Report" , "_self")
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To view your tour plan of this month.click on the link
CustomField.label: My plan -This month
